languages.text: "Во мне не сомневайся. Я — законченн{mf|ый|ая} мерзав{mf|ец|ка} и отпет{mf|ый|ая} грешни{mf|к|ца}, противн{mf|ый|ая} Императору".

traits.locale_text: "Во мне не сомневайся. Я — законченн{mf|ый|ая} мерзав{mf|ец|ка} и отпет{mf|ый|ая} грешни{mf|к|ца}, противн{mf|ый|ая} Императору".

languages.text: "Have no doubt about me. I'm a complete reprobate and an inveterate miscreant whose existence is an affront to the Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Во мне не сомневайся. Я — законченн{mf|ый|ая} мерзав{mf|ец|ка} и отпет{mf|ый|ая} грешни{mf|к|ца}, противн{mf|ый|ая} Императору".

traits.locale_text: "Have no doubt about me. I'm a complete reprobate and an inveterate sinner whose existence is an affront to the Emperor."
"Have no doubt about me. I'm a complete reprobate and an inveterate sinner whose existence is an affront to the Emperor."
"Have no doubt about me. I'm a complete reprobate and an inveterate sinner whose existence is an affront to the Emperor."
"Have no doubt about me. I'm a complete reprobate and an inveterate sinner whose existence is an affront to the Emperor."
"Have no doubt about me. I'm a complete reprobate and an inveterate miscreant whose existence is an affront to the Emperor."

languages.text: “这一点你完全不用怀疑。我是个彻头彻尾的败类，是个不折不扣的罪人。我的存在本身就是对帝皇的侮辱。”
languages.original_text: "Have no doubt about me. I'm a complete reprobate and an inveterate miscreant whose existence is an affront to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “这一点你完全不用怀疑。我是个彻头彻尾的败类，是个不折不扣的罪人。我的存在本身就是对帝皇的侮辱。”

languages.text: «Que no le quepa duda: soy {mf|un|una} criminal {mf|empedernido|empedernida} y {mf|depravado|depravada} cuya mera existencia es un agravio para el Emperador».
languages.original_text: "Have no doubt about me. I'm a complete reprobate and an inveterate miscreant whose existence is an affront to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «Que no le quepa duda: soy {mf|un|una} {mf|pecador|pecadora} {mf|empedernido|empedernida} y {mf|depravado|depravada} cuya mera existencia es un agravio para el Emperador».

languages.text: 「信じろ。{mf|俺|私}は完全な不道徳者であり、根っからの罪人だ。存在自体が皇帝への冒涜だ」
languages.original_text: "Have no doubt about me. I'm a complete reprobate and an inveterate miscreant whose existence is an affront to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「信じろ。{mf|俺|私}は完全な不道徳者であり、根っからの罪人だ。存在自体が皇帝への冒涜だ」

languages.text: "Ihr braucht nicht an mir zu zweifeln. Ich bin {mf|ein Schurke und unverbesserlicher Sünder, dessen|eine Schurkin und unverbesserliche Sünderin, deren} Existenz eine Beleidigung für den Imperator ist."
languages.original_text: "Have no doubt about me. I'm a complete reprobate and an inveterate miscreant whose existence is an affront to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr braucht nicht an mir zu zweifeln. Ich bin {mf|ein Schurke und unverbesserlicher Sünder, dessen|eine Schurkin und unverbesserliche Sünderin, deren} Existenz eine Beleidigung für den Imperator ist."

languages.text: « Dissipons tout doute à mon sujet. Je suis {mf|un parfait dépravé|une parfaite dépravée}, {mf|doublé|doublée} d'{mf|un mécréant invétéré|une mécréante invétérée} dont l'existence même est un affront fait à l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "Have no doubt about me. I'm a complete reprobate and an inveterate miscreant whose existence is an affront to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « Dissipons tout doute à mon sujet. Je suis {mf|un parfait dépravé|une parfaite dépravée}, {mf|doublé|doublée} d'{mf|un pécheur invétéré|une pécheresse invétérée} dont l'existence-même est un affront fait à l'Empereur. »

languages.text: "Bana dair şüphen olmasın. Ben yoldan hepten çıkmış, iflas olmaz bir imansızım. Varlığım dahi İmparator'a hakarettir."
languages.original_text: "Have no doubt about me. I'm a complete reprobate and an inveterate miscreant whose existence is an affront to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Benim hakkında bir şüphen olmasın. Ben tamamen yoldan çıkmış, kötülük düşkünü biriyim ve var olmam bile İmparator'a bir hakarettir."
